alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones County through 430 PM CDT... At 353 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ovett, or 8 miles southeast of Ellisville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ovett around 405 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Mississippi.
